step.name: Distributed-Primitive-Map.Activate-Distributed-Primitives-App
step.exec: onos ${OCI} app activate org.onosproject.distributedprimitives

step.name: Distributed-Primitive-Map.Test-Map-Get
step.exec: onos-cluster-execute-expect map-test foo get a --expect null

step.name: Distributed-Primitive-Map.Test-Map-Put
step.exec: onos-execute-expect ${OCI} map-test foo put a b --expect null

step.name: Distributed-Primitive-Map.Test-Map-Updated-After-Put
step.exec: onos-cluster-execute-expect map-test foo get a --expect b

step.name: Distributed-Primitive-Map.Test-Map-PutIfAbsent-When-Key-Present
step.exec: onos-execute-expect ${OCI} map-test foo putIfAbsent a c --expect b

step.name: Distributed-Primitive-Map.Test-Map-PutIfAbsent-When-Key-Absent
step.exec: onos-execute-expect ${OCI} map-test foo putIfAbsent b c --expect null

step.name: Distributed-Primitive-Map.Test-Map-Updated-After-PutIfAbsent
step.exec: onos-cluster-execute-expect map-test foo get b --expect c

step.name: Distributed-Primitive-Map.Test-Map-Updated-After-PutAndGet
step.exec: onos-execute-expect ${OCI} map-test foo putAndGet b d --expect d

step.name: Distributed-Primitive-Map.Test-Map-Replace-When-Key-Absent
step.exec: onos-execute-expect ${OCI} map-test foo replace c e --expect null

step.name: Distributed-Primitive-Map.Test-Map-Replace-When-Key-Present
step.exec: onos-execute-expect ${OCI} map-test foo replace b e --expect d

step.name: Distributed-Primitive-Map.Test-Map-Replace-When-Value-Does-Not-Match
step.exec: onos-execute-expect ${OCI} map-test foo replace b x f --expect false

step.name: Distributed-Primitive-Map.Test-Map-Replace-When-Value-Does-Match
step.exec: onos-execute-expect ${OCI} map-test foo replace b e f --expect true

step.name: Distributed-Primitive-Map.Test-Map-ContainsValue-False-Case
step.exec: onos-cluster-execute-expect map-test foo containsValue x --expect false

step.name: Distributed-Primitive-Map.Test-Map-ContainsValue-True-Case
step.exec: onos-cluster-execute-expect map-test foo containsValue f --expect true

step.name: Distributed-Primitive-Map.Test-Map-Size
step.exec: onos-cluster-execute-expect map-test foo size --expect 2

step.name: Distributed-Primitive-Map.Test-Map-IsEmpty
step.exec: onos-cluster-execute-expect map-test foo isEmpty --expect false

step.name: Distributed-Primitive-Map.Test-Map-Remove
step.exec: onos-execute-expect ${OCI} map-test foo remove b --expect f

step.name: Distributed-Primitive-Map.Test-Map-Remove-Key-Value-Does-Not-Match
step.exec: onos-execute-expect ${OCI} map-test foo remove a c --expect false

step.name: Distributed-Primitive-Map.Test-Map-Remove-Key-Value-Does-Match
step.exec: onos-execute-expect ${OCI} map-test foo remove a b --expect true

step.name: Distributed-Primitive-Map.Test-Map-Clear
step.exec: onos ${OCI} map-test foo clear

step.name: Distributed-Primitive-Map.Test-Map-Cleared
step.exec: onos-execute-expect ${OCI} map-test foo isEmpty --expect true

step.name: Distributed-Primitive-Map.Check-Log-Exceptions
step.exec: onos-check-logs ${OCI}

step.name: Distributed-Primitive-Map.Teardown-Distributed-Primitives-Test-App
step.exec: onos ${OCI} app deactivate org.onosproject.distributedprimitives
